channel.title: Server Status in Profile
channel.description: So I was thinking about how there is a minecraft name in the profile and it got me thinking. This is moparscape it would be nice if in a persons profile it linked them to their server status page advert if they had one. It would also be beneficial for the server developers out there who also host a server.

item.title: Server Status in Profile
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

This is actually a really good idea, I like the sound of this. But maybe it would just be pointless. Because i don’t tend to look at anybodies profile. Let alone my own.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status in Profile
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

It would only be listed in the profile so it isn’t really advertising. Is it not advertising when we advertise our services, our servers etc in our signatures? That is shown on every post made.

This would just be a link to your server in the server status page. I am not implying adding a link to the server itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status in Profile
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Loveandpower:

So I was thinking about how there is a minecraft name in the profile and it got me thinking. This is moparscape it would be nice if in a persons profile it linked them to their server status page advert if they had one. It would also be beneficial for the server developers out there who also host a server.

the idea of the server status page is so we dont have advertising on the forums
